DOC.brief_summary: This is a study of the effects of fast paced assembly line work on women. We are studying problems women in poultry processing have with their muscles, tendons, and nerves as well as acute injuries they have in the workplace. We are also studying how their work affects the quality of their lives.
DOC.brief_title: Work and Health Disparities Among Rural Women
DOC.criteria: Women employed in poultry processing less than 9 months
